events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case was reviewed and labelled under the Refund cluster due to customer's request for money back.
Customer service agent John has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's order.
Hello! I’m John from customer support, I’ll assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 123456789. Attached is the photo showing I received a completely different product than what I ordered.
We apologize for the mistake. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick response. I am satisfied with the proposed refund and return process.
The refund has been processed successfully and the return label was emailed to the customer. Case considered resolved.
We are reaching out to confirm that you received the refund and that everything was to your satisfaction.
The refund case has been formally closed following confirmation that the customer received their money back and was happy with the support.
A customer service satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback about their recent refund experience.
